Introduction.title: LikeCoin: appreciation is more than a thumb
Introduction.description: The currency for indie content creators

Why.title:
Most content creators don't get income.
For some, not even feedbacks and attribution.

description.1: Creators make contents, while channels take most of the profits through advertisement.
description.2: Many content consumers are willing to show their appreciation by paying, but transaction cost is too high for micro tipping.
description.3: Attribution is hard. Derivative works add  another dimension of complexity.

How.title: An ecosystem of appreciation is needed.
How.description:
Sharing is not a purely selfless act — while thinking beyond one’s own personal benefit is at the core of why we share, it also pays itself forward in reputation, and rewards us with good feelings and personal gratification. Sharing contributes to our individual identity — how we want to see ourselves, and be seen, in the world.

-- Creative Commons 2015­-2020 Organizational Strategy

description.directors: directors compose stories with assets from various artists and musicians
description.readers: LikeCoins by readers are distributed to all creators automatically

description.smartContract: users attribute and tip creators with LikeCoins through smart contract

description.tipping: readers tip writers directly with LikeCoins
description.boostContent: writers boost their articles using LikeCoins

description.fansSupport: audience supporting their favorite broadcasters with LikeCoins
description.vote: fans vote for their favorite live streamer with LikeCoins to boost their rank
